attributes.action: prevent immigration into this country of people who are carrying major diseases.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
From a purely health perspective, we should not allow anyone into this country who has one of a range of major diseases.
We should be giving anyone who wishes to come here a full medical examination and reject them if they carry any nasty bacteria or viruses.
The aim is to protect British people only and is not intended to be viewed as racist.
